Category:Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order voice actors
Category:Star Wars: The Bad Batch voice actors

nodes.text: Andrew Kishino (born March 20, 1970) is a Canadian voice actor who portrayed Saw Gerrera in Star Wars: The Clone Wars and Star Wars: The Bad Batch. He has also provided his voice to Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and The Lion Guard. Kishino was married to Vanessa Marshall, who voices Hera Syndulla in Star Wars Rebels.
